DOC.brief_summary: This trial is conducted in China. This trial aims for a comparison of the effect on glycemic control in subjects with type 2 diabetes of insulin detemir or NPH-insulin given once daily at bedtime as add-on to oral anti-diabetic drug(s).
DOC.brief_title: Effect of Insulin Detemir on Blood Glucose Control in Subjects With Type 2 Diabetes
DOC.criteria: Type 2 diabetes HbA1C greater than 7.5% and less than or equal to 11.0% Currently on any oral antidiabetic drug (OAD) more than or equal to 3 months Previous acute treatment with insulin for more than 7 days. Treatment with OAD(s) which does not adhere to the approval labeling. Proliferate retinopathy or maculopathy that has required acute treatment within the last year. Known hypoglycaemia unawareness or recurrent major hypoglycaemia, that may interfere with study participation as judged by the Investigator.
